name: Zebra_Cookie
short_description: Handling cookies can be a daunting task using plain JavaScript, and since jQuery doesn’t natively include functions for handling cookies, I've created Zebra_Cookie - an extremely small (~500 bytes minified) jQuery plugin for writing, reading and deleting cookies.
summary: An extremely small jQuery plugin for handling cookies
